style.description: Sets alignment of content within the element.
Sets the background color of the element.
Sets the background image of the element.
Sets the border of the element.
Applies a shadow effect to the element.
Sets the cursor when hovering over the element.
Sets flex properties for the element.
Sets properties of a flex item.
Sets the size of the text.
Sets the height of the element.
Aligns flex items along the main axis.
Sets the spacing between letters in text.
Sets the height of text lines.
Sets the width of the element.
Sets how words break in text.
Sets the stacking order of the element.
Sets zoom scale of the element.

content.description: Escapes HTML or special characters to display as plain text.
Includes another internal HTML file or page fragment into the element.
Inserts new content immediately before the element.
Inserts new content just inside the element, before its first child.
Inserts new content just inside the element, after its last child.
Inserts new content immediately after the element.
Removes characters from the start of content.
Removes characters from the end of content.
Converts content to lowercase.
Converts content to uppercase.
Sets or changes the action URL of a form.
Sets a maximum value.
Sets the text content.
Sets HTML content.
Sets the href attribute.
Sets a query-based href.
Sets the value of the element.
Sets the element's id.
Sets the name of the element.
Sets the source of the image.

logic.description: Evaluates a condition and runs actions if true or false.

value.description: Resets the value of the element.
Toggles the value of the element.

event.description: Triggered when the element is clicked.
Triggered when the element or feature becomes enabled.
Triggered when the element or feature becomes disabled.
Triggered when the element gains focus.
Triggered when the element loses focus.
Triggered when the element is hidden.
Triggered when the element html is changed.
Triggered when the element is shown.
Triggered when a form is submitted.
Triggered when the user confirms an action in a confirmation dialog.
Triggered when a confirmation dialog is accepted; typically used to pass a value or trigger chained actions.
Triggered when value is changed inside an element.
Triggered when the mouse pointer moves over the element.
Triggered when the mouse pointer moves out of the element.

behavior.description: Prevents sending the payload for POST, PUT, or PATCH requests when set.
Runs attributes in the specified order inside the element.

interactive.description: Displays an alert dialog with a message to the user.
Shows a confirmation dialog to the user.
Executes an action or expression when the element is clicked.
Enables an element to respond to keyboard keys; works with keyboard-key, keyboard-word, and related attributes.
Specifies a key required to finalize a word sequence action; used with keyboard-word and keyboard-action.
Specifies which keyboard key triggers the action on an element with the keyboard-action attribute.
Maps a key to a replacement character in an input or text element; used with keyboard-action.
Removes a previously translated character from an input or text element; used with keyboard-action.
Specifies a word sequence that triggers an action on an element with the keyboard-action attribute.

configuration.description: Limits where the keyboard-key or keyboard-word action applies; optional and used with keyboard-action.
Sets the base URL based on host match.

variable.name: docMode
variable.description: Gets the document mode of the current browser.

variable.name: href
variable.description: Gets the current URL of the current page.

variable.name: isFrontpage
variable.description: Gets whether the current page is the Start Page.

variable.name: language
variable.description: Gets the current language code of the page.

variable.name: mainScrollHeight
variable.description: Gets the total scrollable height of the main container.

variable.name: title
variable.description: Gets the title of the current page.

variable.name: windowHeight
variable.description: Gets the height of the window in pixels.

variable.name: windowWidth
variable.description: Gets the width of the window in pixels.
